casebody.data:
Mary Angela BOWSER, Randall Bowser, Cathleen C. Perry, and Anthony P. Perry, Appellants (Third-Party Defendants),
v.
Paulette OAKES and Garland Oakes, Appellees (Third-Party Plaintiffs). PNC Bank, N.A., Plaintiff,
v.
Click Portrait Studio, LLC, Paulette Oakes, and Garland Oakes, Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 10A01-1702-CC-327 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed December 6, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BROWN , J.

Affirmed.

MAY, J., Concurs.

PYLE, J., Concurs.
